display_long_description:
Dread Drive: Undead Roads is a quick-fire VR driving shooter. The world’s a wreck, people still need supplies, and you’re the only courier left.

How it works
Drive one of three rides: a minibus, a solid pickup, or a quick street car.

Pick up boxes from spots that change each mission, forest huts, smashed gas pumps, snowed-in cabins, factory docks.

Drop them off at the camp before the timer runs out and a radiation cloud rolls over the road.

Shoot zombies hanging on the doors and windows with pistol, shotgun, or Uzi. Switch guns with one button.

Steer around wrecks, fires, and fallen beams that can end your run fast.

What’s in the game now
Four hand built runs:

Foggy forest highway

Ruined city gas station stretch

Snowy mountain road

Rusted factory yard

Each run throws in more zombies and cuts the clock shorter.

Get stronger
Finish runs to earn cash. Use it to unlock tougher cars, better armor, and harder hitting guns. Replay to beat your own time.

Early access plan
Month 2: Global leaderboards plus a new old house mission 

Month 3: Online co-op plus a wild train ride mission

After that: A big boss-fight finale and an endless survival mode

Headsets
Made for Meta Quest 2, Quest 3, Quest 3 S, and Quest Pro.

Grab the wheel, keep rolling, and show the wasteland that deliveries still count.
